title: Gothic type font - please help to identify
content:
Hello all,

Gothic type font - please help me to identify

I've reworked 2 letters "N" and "W"...from an image, but I would appreciate to find the name of the font so I can purchase it.

thanks :)  
Sandra

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301231503im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nw_6272.jpg)
author: serazoo

comments.content:
The Gothic one has been identified thanks...please help identify this new one  
I have an error posting a new message "Internal server error"...I'm trying with my old message... :) thx

please help

I only have 4 letters...I've tried whatthefont identifier with no luck

The letter "i" has its right arm missing, I think it was done on purpose as a design thing. You can see there are twirls added for design. The straight line in the letter "e" is not as straight, it kind of narrows from right to left. The tree is obviously there for design.

preview:  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301231503im_/http:/www.vamonosamigos.com/s-gie.jpg)

thanks

Just like your sample. Created by gluk, FoglihtenNo04  
 [http://www.glukfonts.pl/font.php?font=FoglihtenNo04](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301231503/http:/www.glukfonts.pl/font.php?font=FoglihtenNo04)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301231503im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sgie1_3588.jpg)

oh my god ! "hrant" u r absolutely fantastic !!!

cheers mate...happy new year 2013 to all !  
Cheers  
Sandra :)

Hello all :)

I still can't post new messages...500 Internal Server Error...for 2 years now...I've written to Admin several times, I'm not a spammer...created new account, same problem :(

adding to my first ever post still works...don't understand why !

anyway :)

Please identify this font - with FAT capital letters :)  
Cheers  
Sandra

Here's the previews of a few letters I've scanned :)

[http://serva-tech.com/e.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301231503/http:/serva-tech.com/e.jpg "http://serva-tech.com/e.jpg")

"EB" look like Dragonwick by David Rakowski [http://www.dafont.com/dragonwick.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301231503/http:/www.dafont.com/dragonwick.font)  
"curies" looks like Benguiat. [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/benguiat/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301231503/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/benguiat/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130301231503im_/http:/typophile.com/files/curi1_3898.jpg)

Thank you so much DPape, right on !

any idea about my "500 Internal Server Error" ?

thanks again :)  
Sandra

You're welcome.

No technical expertise, sorry, barely do fonts...
